import {useState} from "react"; //import firebase from 'firebase/compat/app'; import {db} from "../../firebase" function MenteeForm() { //const [username, setUserName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [loader, setLoader] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoader(true); db.collection("contacts") .add({ name: name, email: email, message: message, }) .then(() => { setLoader(false); alert("Your message has been submitted👍"); }) .catch((error) => { alert(error.message); setLoader(false); }); setName(""); setEmail(""); setMessage(""); }; return (
Register as a Mentee

) } export default MenteeForm
